about.title: About Me
about.description1: Fullstack developer with experience in creating scalable and efficient applications, proficient in both frontend and backend development. Experience with frameworks such as NestJS, Express, React, Astro, and Django.
about.description2: Skilled in SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases, and REST service integration. Basic knowledge of Docker for deployments.
about.description3: Professional goal: Master backend development in JavaScript and Python, as well as other relevant languages like PHP.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can find some of the projects I have worked on. Each project showcases different skills and technologies I have used.

portfolioWebsite.title: Portfolio Web
portfolioWebsite.description: A personal portfolio showcasing projects, blogs, and resume. Our current project, designed with Tailwind CSS and React.
portfolioWebsite.note: Currently, I do not have my own domain due to budget constraints
